allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Bulk Scan feature for multi-card scanning workflow

Adds a Bulk Scan view that allows selecting multiple card images at once,
scanning them all sequentially with progress tracking, then reviewing and
editing each card before saving to the database. Supports front+back image
pairing mode and individual image mode.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add graded card support with AI detection, UI, and export

Adds full grading workflow: IsGraded checkbox reveals grading company
\(editable ComboBox with PSA/BGS/CGC/CCG/SGC presets + persistent custom
entries\), card grade and auto grade dropdowns \(0-10 in 0.5 increments +
Authentic\), and cert number field. AI prompt detects grading from slab
images. CSV export includes grading info in title and description. Also
adds AutoGrade field to Card model with schema migration, and Git
branching workflow rules to CLAUDE.md.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add self-learning checklist database with JSON seed data

Checklists now grow automatically as cards are scanned and saved.
LearnFromCardAsync creates new checklists for unknown sets and enriches
existing ones with new card numbers and variations. Seed data moved from
hardcoded C# to embedded JSON resources \(4 sets\). Adds import/export
support for community checklist sharing. Settings toggle for enabling
checklist learning. Schema migration adds DataSource and LastEnrichedAt
tracking columns.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge master \(graded-cards\) into checklist-learning

Resolves conflicts in SchemaUpdater, AppSettings, and ScanViewModel
by keeping both graded card and checklist learning additions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
